name: The MEMEROOMS
description:

!WARNING! THIS GAME CONTAINS JUMPSCARES AND LOUD SOUNDS

Welcome to the MEMEROOMS, a infinite rooms with 4 different entities called Memes, GOOD LUCK for win with 4 entities! Share your records in twitter with the hastag #MemeRooms.
